readable.content: A girl wearing an hat and holding an iPod sits on the side of a building . A man sits on the sidewalk listening to headphones . a single woman wearing a black hat and leather jacket listening to music Person in a black hat , jacket , pants and shoes sitting on concrete curb against a brick background . Person listening to mp3 player sitting on curb .
